type.name: org.gradle.plugins.ide.idea.GenerateIdeaModule
type.description:
* Generates an IDEA module file. If you want to fine tune the idea configuration *

* Please refer to interesting examples on idea configuration in {@link IdeaModule}. *

* At this moment nearly all configuration is done via {@link IdeaModule}.

method.name: getModule
method.description: * The Idea module model containing the details required to generate the module file.

method.name: getOutputFile
method.description:
* Configures output *.iml file. It's optional because the task should configure it correctly for you (including making sure it is unique in the multi-module build). If you really need to * change the output file name it is much easier to do it via the idea.module.name property.

Please refer to documentation in {@link IdeaModule} name property. In IntelliJ IDEA * the module name is the same as the name of the *.iml file.

property.name: module
property.description: * The Idea module model containing the details required to generate the module file.

property.name: outputFile
property.description:
* Configures output *.iml file. It's optional because the task should configure it correctly for you (including making sure it is unique in the multi-module build). If you really need to * change the output file name it is much easier to do it via the idea.module.name property.

Please refer to documentation in {@link IdeaModule} name property. In IntelliJ IDEA * the module name is the same as the name of the *.iml file.
